record.title: Machine learning to emulate software applications
record.abstract: Methods and systems for emulating an application include generating a log template to match one or more patterns in a set of application logs collected from an original application. Semantic state representations are learned for the original application from the log template. A classifier is trained to predict a next action template based on a sequence of prior action templates. A regressor is trained to generate a parameter value for a template based on a sequence of prior action templates and a particular semantic state of the original application.
